trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfo" /> object that inherits from <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfoBase" /> used for the service operation information of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SendActivity" /> and <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ReceiveActivity" /> activities.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfo" /> objeto que herda de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfoBase" /> usado para as informações de operação de serviço do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SendActivity" /> e <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ReceiveActivity" /> atividades.

trans-unit.source: Note that this operation information must be based on a CLR type.
trans-unit.target: Observe que essas informações de operação devem ser baseadas em um tipo CLR.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.TypedOperationInfo" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.TypedOperationInfo" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.TypedOperationInfo> class requires that a service contract is present.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.TypedOperationInfo> classe requer que um contrato de serviço está presente.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.TypedOperationInfo" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.TypedOperationInfo" />.

trans-unit.source: The type of the associated contract interface.
trans-unit.target: O tipo da interface de contrato associado.

trans-unit.source: The method name of the associated service operation.
trans-unit.target: O nome do método da operação de serviço associado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.TypedOperationInfo" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.TypedOperationInfo" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The type of the associated contract interface.
trans-unit.target: O tipo da interface de contrato associado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object that represents the type of the associated contract interface.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Type" /> objeto que representa o tipo da interface de contrato associado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to compare with the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.TypedOperationInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Object" /> a ser comparado com o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.TypedOperationInfo" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.TypedOperationInfo" /> instances are equal.
trans-unit.target: Determina se duas instâncias <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.TypedOperationInfo" /> são iguais.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the instances are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se as instâncias forem iguais; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Generates a number that corresponds to the value of the object to support the use of a hash table.
trans-unit.target: Gera um número que corresponde ao valor do objeto para suporte ao uso de uma tabela de hash.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> that represents the hash code value of the object.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> que representa o valor de código hash do objeto.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.TypedOperationInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que representa o objeto de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.TypedOperationInfo" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.TypedOperationInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que representa o atual <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.TypedOperationInfo" /> objeto.
